titles.title: A resolution relative to the death of the Honorable Stewart B. McKinney, of Connecticut.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 5/8/1987--Introduced. Expresses the condolences of the Senate on the death of the Honorable Stewart B. McKinney of Connecticut.
